scripts.copy:vendor:dev: cp vendor/soundmanager2.js _public/soundmanager2.js && cp vendor/pouchdb-3.0.6.min.js _public/pouchdb.js && cp vendor/firebase-2.0.5.js _public/firebase.js
scripts.copy:vendor:prod: cp vendor/soundmanager2-nodebug-jsmin.js _public/soundmanager2.js && cp vendor/pouchdb-3.0.6.min.js _public/pouchdb.js && cp vendor/firebase-2.0.5.js _public/firebase.js
scripts.build:prepare: npm run lint && npm run clean:build && npm run clean:public && npm run copy:assets
scripts.build:dev: npm run build:prepare && npm run copy:vendor:dev && grunt build && npm run clean:build
scripts.build:nw: npm run build:prepare && npm run copy:vendor:prod && grunt build && webpack -p --progress --targe node-webkit && npm run nwbuild
scripts.build: npm run build:prepare && npm run copy:vendor:prod && grunt build && webpack -p --debug --devtool source-map --progress && npm run clean:build
scripts.deploy:heroku: npm run heroku:config && env $(cat .env | xargs) npm run build:heroku && git push heroku deploy:master -f
scripts.deploy:divshot: MUSIC_APP_ID=4656659 npm run build && divshot push production
scripts.deploy:divshot:dev: MUSIC_APP_ID=4656659 npm run build && divshot push development
